## Checklist

<!-- Mark all applicable items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code generates no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any debugging code (console.logs, debugger statements)

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in multiple browsers (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested responsive design (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added translations for any new UI strings

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added new dependencies
- [ ] OR: New dependencies are necessary and have been reviewed
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date

### Git

- [ ] My commits follow the conventional commits specification
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main
- [ ] I have resolved all merge conflicts
